title: Efficient solar-driven steam generation for clean water production using a low-cost and scalable natural rubber composite sponge
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1365-1376
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00094C, Paper
Parichart Onsri, Piyatida Thaveemas, Pongthep Prajongtat, Whijitra Suvandee, Supanna Techasakul, Laemthong Chuenchom, Decha Dechtrirat
Utilizing well-established foam production technology facilitates the scalability of the methodology described in this study, allowing SSG materials to rapidly transition from the laboratory to commercial and real-world applications.
